Posts.Content: barbmom wrote: My mother in law just had a mastectomy today.  We live far away and can not afford to visit at this time.  Does anyone know of a gift that she would find useful or helpful as she recovers?  If I cant visit to help, I would like to send her something that might help her recovery.  FYI:Chemo and radiation treatments have not been decided yet.  She is 73 years old.  Thank you!
